description: Eastern star sedge (Carex radiata) is an amazing and versatile plant species. It is drought tolerant and can survive in a variety of soil types, making it ideal for gardens in areas with poor soil conditions or little rainfall. It has bright green foliage with clusters of pale yellow flowers that radiate in the sun. These flowers are very attractive to pollinators such as bees and butterflies, adding a lovely splash of colour to your garden. Its fine texture and texture adds interest and texture your borders. It is also a good choice if you are looking for a low-maintenance and fast-growing ornamental grass. All in all, eastern star sedge is a great addition to any garden!
